籤詩版本二:
Whale inoramba isina kuchinja uye inorinda rwizi, isingakwanisi kusimuka uye tariro yakakwirira.
Shanduko dzinoshamisa mune ramangwana, Xu Jun anosvetuka pamusoro pegedhi redhiragoni
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inoratidza mufananidzo usina kuchinjwa wewhale.
Shivirira kusvikira nguva yasvika.
解曰: Unofanira kuzvitsungirira. Iva nemoyo murefu uye mwoyo murefu. Unofanira kumirira kusvikira nguva yasvika. Mbiri ichiripo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Bu Di
Munguva yeHondo Yenyika, Su Qin, chizvarwa cheLuoyang, ainamata Gui Guzi semudzidzisi wake.
Su Qin akakumbira Mambo weQin uye akanyora kagumi nembiri, asi Mambo weQin haana kugamuchira nharo yake. Paakadzokera kumba kwake bhachi rake remakushe rakabvaruka uye mari yakanga yapera.Akasvika pamusiwo achifemereka.Mukadzi wake haana kuita hanya nezvake uye mukadzi wehanzvadzi yake haana kumubikira.
Su Qin akanyara uye akatsamwa, saka akawana Taigong Yin Fu (bhuku pamusoro peunyanzvi hwehondo) uye akariverenga nehasha. Paunenge uchinzwa kuvhiringika uye usimbe, ingobaya chidya chako neruko uye uverenge zvakare kana ichirwadza.
Gare gare, dzidziso yaHe Cong (He Zong) yakashandiswa kubatanidza nyika nhanhatu kurwisa Qin. Akakurudzira Mambo Zhao uye akave mutungamiriri wenyika nhanhatu.
聖意: Mumba handina kugadzikana, ndichiri kuda kutsvaga hupfumi, rombo rakanaka, kutengeserana, kuroora kwakaoma, Liujia chikomborero kune vanofamba netsoka, minda yakachengetedzeka, makonye esadza akanaka, mhuka nhanhatu hadzina kunaka, vanhu vakashaikwa, kumatare edzimhosva uye kutama, kurasika. zvinhu, zvirwere zvekumaodzanyemba, kunamatira dziviriro, makomo nemakuva.
